00016 #ifndef __AKNEXNOTEVIEW_H__
00017 #define __AKNEXNOTEVIEW_H__
00018 
00019 // INCLUDES
00020 #include <aknview.h>
00021 
00022 
00023 
00024 // FORWARD DECLARATIONS
00025 class CAknExNoteContainer;
00026 
00027 // CLASS DECLARATION
00028 
00029 
00030 /**
00031 * CAknExNoteView view class.
00032 */
00033 class CAknExNoteView : public CAknView
00034     {
00035     public: // Constructors and destructor
00036 
00037         /**
00038         * CAknExNoteView
00039         * C++ default constructor.
00040         */
00041         CAknExNoteView();
00042 
00043         /**
00044         * ~CAknExNoteView
00045         * Virtual Destructor.
00046         */
00047         virtual ~CAknExNoteView();
00048 
00049         /**
00050         * ConstructL
00051         * 2nd phase constructor.
00052         */
00053         void ConstructL();
00054 
00055     public: // New functions
00056 
00057         /**
00058         * DisplayNextOutlineL
00059         * Display next outline.
00060         */
00061         void DisplayNextOutlineL();
00062 
00063     public: // From CAknView.
00064 
00065         /**
00066         * Id
00067         * Returns the ID of view.
00068         * @return The ID of view.
00069         */
00070         TUid Id() const;
00071 
00072 
00073         /**
00074         * HandleCommandL.
00075         * handles the commands. if the command is command which is require to
00076         * display outline-screen, the command is reported to container class.
00077         * @param aCommand Command to be handled.
00078         */
00079         void HandleCommandL( TInt aCommand );
00080 
00081         /**
00082         * From CAknView, HandleViewRectChange.
00083         * Handles the size of the clientrect.
00084         */
00085         void HandleViewRectChange();
00086 
00087 
00088     private: // New functions
00089 
00090         /**
00091         * IndicateTitlePaneTextL
00092         * Set title text to status-pane
00093         * @param aCommand Command to be handled.
00094         */
00095         void IndicateTitlePaneTextL( TInt aCommand );
00096 
00097 
00098     private: // From CAknView
00099 
00100         /**
00101         * DoActivateL.
00102         * Creates the Container class object.
00103         * @param aPrevViewId aPrevViewId is not used.
00104         * @param aCustomMessageId aCustomMessageId is not used.
00105         * @param aCustomMessage aCustomMessage is not used.
00106         */
00107         void DoActivateL( const TVwsViewId& aPrevViewId,
00108                           TUid aCustomMessageId,
00109                           const TDesC8& aCustomMessage );
00110 
00111         /**
00112         * DoDeactivate.
00113         * Deletes the Container class object.
00114         */
00115         void DoDeactivate();
00116 
00117 
00118     private: // Data
00119 
00120         /**
00121         * iContainer
00122         * Owned by CAknExNoteView object.
00123         */
00124         CAknExNoteContainer*    iContainer;
00125 
00126         /** Integer for Current outline **/
00127         TInt                    iCurrentOutline;
00128 
00129     };
